pageContext.title: Trek through the 4 content summits you’ll see at Tech in Asia Jakarta 2018
pageContext.content:
Tech in Asia Jakarta is back once again and it’s calling out to all aspiring entrepreneurs, innovative startups, and passionate tech-lovers! Prepare yourselves for October 23 & 24 as Tech in Asia invades the Jakarta Convention Center with a breath of fresh air as the content stages get a brand new look.

This year, in addition to the Main Stage, there will be three new expert stages named after the tallest summits in the country – Kerinci, Semeru, and Rinjani. Expect to journey across different technological heights, discover the rising industry trends, and reach the apexes of startup success! You’re in for even more valuable insights, discussions about the latest trends, and bountiful networking opportunities.

Want to get a sneak peek of the content across the four stages? Read on and get ready to plan your conference itineraries for your biggest tech expedition for 2018.

Main Stage

Interested in learning from a tech celebrity in person or would you like to discover the stories and experiences of the movers and shakers in the region? The Main Stage is where you’ll want to be!

Attendees can expect a kick-ass lineup of speakers and changemakers in the tech ecosystem discussing topics such as the future of entertainment, the context of e-wallets in Indonesia, and many more! Make your way to the Main Stage for nuggets of advice and wisdom from guest speakers, including the likes of Lembu Wiworojati of Bukalapak, Theo Vassilakis of Grab, Helen Wong of Qiming Venture Partners and many more.

Kerinci Stage

Sessions revolve around: product enhancement, regulation and policies, digital transformation, marketing hacks, exit strategies, creative thinking.

Want to discover Indonesia’s data privacy laws? How about settling the advertising debate between the key opinion leader and conventional media?

Head over and explore questions like these at the Kerinci Stage, where six tracks revolving around product enhancement, regulation and policy, digital transformation, marketing hacks, exit strategies, and creative thinking will give you the invaluable wisdom and knowledge to level up your entrepreneurial game.

With guest speakers from Kata.ai, Deloitte, the United Nations, and more, you’re bound to brush shoulders with the region’s key movers and stakeholders and learn business know-how from the best in the Indonesian startup landscape!

Semeru Stage

Sessions revolve around: growth goals, culture & ethics, fintech, financial goals, partnership & collaboration.

Technology is rapidly evolving, generational workforces are shifting, and consumer demands are steadily increasing. As a result, business challenges have completely changed as well.

From figuring out the ins and outs of creating an engaged company culture, to navigating your way through the new frontier of cryptocurrency, it takes a village of information and wisdom to get your business through the advancements of the 21st century.

Cue the Semeru Stage. With tracks focusing on growth goals, culture & ethics, financial goals, fintech, and partnership & collaboration; entrepreneurs, startups, and investors alike will learn a thing or two about building a kick-ass business.

Expect to learn about several other topics such as creating an “open source first” culture, enhancing customer acquisition operations, and more from thought leaders from the likes of Grab, Canva, and GO-JEK at the Semeru stage.

Rinjani Stage

Sessions revolve around: business development & sales, investment, profit & revenue, talent management, tech disruption, expansion.

Every startup’s journey includes customer acquisition and expansion. With growth in mind, there also comes obstacles a team needs to go through. At the Rinjani stage, attendees can look forward to discovering about topics such as life post-Series A funding, developing sales frameworks, and more.

With tracks focusing on business development & sales, investments, profit & revenue, talent management, tech disruption, and expansion, the Rinjani stage highlights applicable strategies and learnings from companies such as CloudFlare, Solidiance, Spiral Ventures and other guests.

Traverse Rinjani, Semaru, and Kerinci at #tiajakarta2018 with just one pass!

Aptly named after the highest peaks in the country, the three expert stages and the Main Stage offer attendees a wealth of jam-packed experiences and learnings, and you only need one pass to get access to all of them. The pass also grants you entry into the conference’s startup exhibition – Startup Factory, where networking opportunities and product discoveries abound.

Starting now till this Sunday, October 14, 11:59PM (GMT +7), passes come with a 10 percent discount as long as you use the code: tiajkt10 at checkout. Hurry because that’s less than four days before prices increase.

seo.title: Content stages at Tech in Asia Jakarta 2018
seo.description: Plan your conference itineraries with this sneak peek into the four stages at Tech in Asia Jakarta 2018 this October 23 & 24.
